title: Highly efficient mobility, separation and charge transfer in black SnO2–TiO2 structures with co-catalysts: the key step for the photocatalytic hydrogen evolution
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,26259-26271
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03731F, Paper

Ángeles Mantilla, Diana Guerrero-Araque, Jhon Harrison Sierra-Uribe, Luis Lartundo-Rojas, Ricardo Gómez, Héctor A. Calderon, Rodolfo Zanella, David Ramírez-Ortega
Oxygen vacancies and co-catalysts enhance photocatalytic hydrogen production since these improve the charge carrier separation.
